summary: Economists are divided on this issue, and *some* do believe this, but not *most*.

statements.quote: Chris, most economists believe that over 70 percent of corporate taxes are paid for by the workers. And the fact that the Treasury Department, I think it was eight or 10 years ago, put out a piece otherwise. I don't believe in that. Our current economic team does not believe in that. There is lots of economic research.

name: most economists agree that workers pay 70% of corporate taxes
